mapper.select: select convert(int,SUM(ISNULL(BaseQuantity,0))) from ST_CurrentStock WHERE idinventory=#{0} AND idmarketingOrgan = N'1' AND idwarehouse=N'2'
select convert(int,SUM(ISNULL(BaseQuantity,0))) from ST_CurrentStock WHERE idinventory=#{0} AND idmarketingOrgan = N'1' AND idwarehouse=N'1'
